content: The int.mod, int.div, and int.fdiv in this example code https://github.com/leanprover/mathlib/blob/251a8c367bec656a85a70894b169a1e555efd2bd/docs/theories/integers.md are returning the errors: unknown identifier 'int.mod' for each function in vscode. Have the identifiers changed at all recently?
Ah yeah, it just doesn't work on the homebrew install on my mac. It works on the install I have on Ubuntu. Thanks.
